short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to view lyrics.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that provides its user with lyrics to a song with the click of a button. It also has integrated search boxes for word definitions by Urban Dictionary and also for custom song lookups. At the end of the song lyrics is also a Genius link for the current song displayed.
